title: How to Breed a Moon Dragon in DragonVale

steps.title: Go to your breeding cave or the epic breeding island.
steps.content: Go to your breeding cave or the epic breeding island. Your park needs to be at level 10 or higher before trying to breed this dragon.

steps.title: For a successful outcome, the elements of cold and lightning need to be present, and as such, there are numerous possible combinations of breeding pairs.
steps.content: For a successful outcome, the elements of cold and lightning need to be present, and as such, there are numerous possible combinations of breeding pairs. Some suggestions for possible combinations include: Cold dragon with a lightning dragon Blue fire dragon with a storm dragon Crystal dragon with a blue fire dragon Mud dragon with a storm dragon Quake dragon with an ice dragon Flower dragon with a storm dragon Water dragon with a firefly dragon Sonic with a snow dragon Fire dragon with a storm dragon.

steps.title: Wait 48 hours for breeding.
steps.content: Wait 48 hours for breeding. The egg color will be a silvery blue with a half moon icon on it. Breeding time can be hastened by spending gems.

steps.title: Put the egg into nursery and wait another 48 hours until it hatches.
steps.content: Put the egg into nursery and wait another 48 hours until it hatches.

steps.title: Place the moon dragon in a moon habitat.
steps.content: Place the moon dragon in a moon habitat. To help it grow, feed it the same food as all baby dragons.
